# Morphism Systems Governance\n\nThe lawein organization is the home for Morphism Systems LLC open-source projects, documentation, and automation. morphism-framework is the canonical monorepo (52 packages, 18 platforms) for building Morphism Systems platforms.\n\n## Primary docset\n- morphism-framework/docs/morphism-bible/ — Single source of truth for architecture, workflows, and governance.\n- MORPHISM_VISION.md (morphism-framework/docs/) — Canonical vision document that defines system identity, product taxonomy, branding, and decision criteria.\n\n## Contribution expectations\n- Branches: eat/*, ix/*, hotfix/*, elease/* target main.\n- Commits: 	ype(scope): message per Morphism Systems commit conventions.\n- Pull requests: required for public-facing changes, platform updates, or infrastructure modifications.\n\n## Relationship to Morphism Systems LLC\n- Morphism Systems LLC owns the lawein GitHub organization and uses it to publish Morphism Systems packages, platforms, and design assets.\n- All documentation and branding under lawein should reference Morphism Systems LLC to maintain one voice.\n- Security, compliance, and build automation are documented in morphism-framework/docs/governance/.\n
